subject: Pro x ultra pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I am fairly new to SIM racing and would like to upgrade my pedals on my rig. I am looking at your Pro x ultra pedal set with the linear reactor. Can you confirm this comes with the heel plate, and that it comes with the power supply too. Is there anything else I need To complete the set to buy absolutely everything to complete the package?

Thank you.
James

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text:
I can't access my ticket information on your website. It says I don't have access to view it

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Hare,     The VAM Pro needs to be purchased separately, and it also requires a 24V power supply. You can also specify the country standard for the power plug.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor

Sure, so this listing:

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra?variant=51308303974714

And then pick the vam pro linear option at £110 and that comes with power supply too?

Are the vam pro linear compatible directly with SIM hub or must it go through your software first? I want to be able to control them through simhub

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James Hare,  We now support SIMHUB, allowing you to access telemetry data from over 100 racing games without needing to run the SIMSONN Manager software.
ID 为 659 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单659  
      主题: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor  
      描述:  
Hello,  
 
 
 
 
I am fairly new to SIM racing and would like to upgrade my pedals on my rig. I am looking at your  Pro x ultra pedal set with the linear reactor. Can you confirm this comes with the heel plate, and that it comes with the power supply too. Is there anything
 else I need To complete the set to buy absolutely everything to complete the package? 
 
 
 
 
Thank you. 
 
James

So I can directly control these from simhub like a would a simagic version?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James Hare,     Yes, just like Simagic, it is directly controlled by SimHub.
